slides.title: Apply the Forward Laplace Transform:
slides.text:
▶ Original Domain ➜ Laplace Domain
▶ Differential Equation ➜ Algebraic Equation.

slides.title: Solve for Y:
slides.text: ▶ Isolate Y in the Laplace-Domain Equation.

slides.title: Prepare Y:
slides.text: ▶ Prepare Y for the return back to the Original Domain.

slides.title: Apply the Backward Laplace Transform:
slides.text:
▶ Laplace Domain ➜ Original Domain
▶ Algebraic Solution ➜ Differential Equation Solution.

slides.title: Complete Roadmap
slides.text: ▶ The general steps in the Laplace transform method.
